channel.title: Eveytime i download a client is says its offline
channel.description: eveytime i download a client is says its offline changed the ip address to 127.0.0.1 compile then load the client try it log in and it says server offline what else do i need am i missing sumthing i thought the server and client was all in i may go back to rsc i got that two work
